name: Snake On Ice
description:
Mashup of the classic game of snake and sliding puzzles. 

Controls:
Mouse - left click only

Click the arrows on the snakes' heads to direct them through the puzzles and into their goal.

Hot Keys:
> F4 - toggle full screen
> F6 - master volume down
> F7 - master volume up
> Delete - toggle FPS

SFX, BGM, and image files are completely free to use for any purpose other than reselling or claiming as your own as long as you give me credit.
